entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as having murdered someone and turning his wand on Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who has heard his parents' voices when fighting dementors.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A character speaking to Harry from a distance, teaching him about curses.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Creatures that force their victims to relive the worst memories of their lives and drown in despair.

entities.name: avada kedavra
entities.description: A powerful curse mentioned by Moody as needing a lot of magic behind it.

entities.name: countercurse
entities.description: A countermeasure to the Avada Kedavra curse, which is not explicitly explained in this text.

relationships.description: Harry has been targeted by Voldemort's wand.
Harry has fought dementors and heard his parents' voices when doing so.
Moody is teaching Harry about the Avada Kedavra curse.
Harry needs to know about the countercurse, as mentioned by Moody.
